AbstractCachingLoggerFactoryAdapter.GetLogger(String) Method

Get a ILog instance by name.

   ByVal name As String _

[C#]
public ILog GetLogger(
   string name

Parameters

name
Usually a Type's Name or FullName property.

Return Value

An ILog instance either obtained from the internal cache or created by a call to CreateLogger.

ILoggerFactoryAdapter.GetLogger
